summary: Noémie and Priscilla, two teenagers from a modest background, nurture the same violence, the same revolt. They seriously worry their families, who feel that these girls are capable of anything.
cast: Elise Lhomeau|Léa Tissier|Elise Caron|Isabelle Sadoyan|Roger Jendly|Thierry Paret|Aurore Soudieux|Yuliya Zimina|Christine Vézinet|Jérôme Derre|Robinson Delacroix|Brice Fazekas|Valérie Duhamel-Manns|Ilyasse Zaki|Renan Carteaux|Sandra Macedo|Simon Delétang|Tom Le Squer|Hélène Dubouchaud|Sophie Nika|Anaïs Delotterie|Mounia Raoui|Axelle Bozler|Elias Achkar|Fabien Orcier|Farida Mazouni|Claire Cathy|Yordan Goldwasser|Simone Tompowsky|Lyès Salem|Camille Rutherford|Gisèle Torterolo|Herbert Stritmatter|Nathalie Eno|Laurent Lacotte|Antoine Mathieu|Guillaume Verdier|Benjamin Lévy
title: Des filles en noir
